name: Upscale
tagline: Learn, Prove, and Earn - All On-Chain.
description: Upscale is a decentralized learning and hiring platform built on the NEAR Protocol. It helps users grow their careers by verifying real-world skills through AI-generated aptitude tests, recommending personalized courses, and rewarding learners with NEAR tokens for completing learning paths and passing tests. Employers can browse certified talent, and users can build a verifiable, on-chain skill profile that replaces traditional résumés. All progress, rewards, and credentials are stored securely and transparently on-chain via smart contracts. Upscale combines education, blockchain, and AI to create a fairer, data-driven path from learning to employment.
